attributes.action: Create a National Recycling Plan to unify and streamline national waste recycling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create a single unified recycling system, in which there is a central plan, no exceptions or exemptions, and is run by a non-political group with the power and authority to force co-operation. But is dedicated to not passing on any costs to the people of this country.
